channel.title: LXQt sudo /usr/bin/anon-connection-wizard password
channel.description: Dear When I am trying to run the system, in the step of Anon Connection Wizard (Tor Connection Configuration), I am requested to provide the password. The name of dialogue is LXQt sudo. The commend is /usr/bin/anon-connection-wizard. I am not quite clear how to solve this matter. Please kindly advice if anyone can help. I am a new user and have first time to try whonix. Thank you in advance.

item.title: LXQt sudo /usr/bin/anon-connection-wizard password
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
whonix.org – 30 Apr 19

Whonix ™ Default Passwords - Whonix

Whonix default username: user Whonix default password: changeme

item.title: LXQt sudo /usr/bin/anon-connection-wizard password
item.dc:creator: by_2020
item.description:
Dear
When I am trying to run the system, in the step of Anon Connection Wizard (Tor Connection Configuration), I am requested to provide the password. The name of dialogue is LXQt sudo. The commend is /usr/bin/anon-connection-wizard. I am not quite clear how to solve this matter. Please kindly advice if anyone can help.
I am a new user and have first time to try whonix. Thank you in advance.

Read full topic
